main.description: Measurement data related to a hypercert record (e.g. an activity and its impact).

subject.description: A strong reference to the record this measurement refers to (e.g. an activity, project, or claim).

metric.description: The metric being measured, e.g. forest area restored, number of users, etc.

unit.description: The unit of the measured value (e.g. kg COâ‚‚e, hectares, %, index score).

startDate.description: The start date and time when the measurement began.

endDate.description: The end date and time when the measurement ended. If it was a one time measurement, the endDate should be equal to the startDate.

locations.description: Optional geographic references related to where the measurement was taken. Each referenced record must conform with the app.certified.location lexicon.

methodType.description: Short identifier for the measurement methodology

methodURI.description: URI to methodology documentation, standard protocol, or measurement procedure

evidenceURI.description: URIs to related evidence or underlying data (e.g. org.hypercerts.claim.evidence records or raw datasets)

measurers.description: DIDs of the entity (or entities) that measured this data

comment.description: Short comment of this measurement, suitable for previews and list views. Rich text annotations may be provided via `commentFacets`.

commentFacets.description: Rich text annotations for `comment` (mentions, URLs, hashtags, etc).

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
